'''Supersized Firework''' is a Quest Item obtained from [[Yoimiya]] during the "[[Proof of Guilt]]" [[Archon Quest]]. The firework is set off in front of the [[Statue of the Omnipresent God]] to distract the [[Tenryou Commission]] headquarters' guards while [[Sayu]] looks for documents during the quest.
